alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 5:55PM CDT until July 13 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Pushmataha County in southeastern Oklahoma... Central Choctaw County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 554 PM CDT, a pair of rapidly developing thunderstorms were located from near Kent and near Hugo, and are nearly stationary or drifting slowly southeast. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Hugo... Kent... Goodland... Messer... Grant... Ord... Speer... Dela... Fallon... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
